summary: Events that are prophesied in the Bible are illustrated to show that civilization is headed for doomsday.
cast: Orson Welles|Babetta|Emile Benoit|Norman Borlaug|Tal Brooke|Beaumont Bruestle|Erin Cameron|Paul Ehrlich|Frank Ferrer|Eric Forsberg|Sam Gilman|John Gribbin|Robert Hackman|Richard Hale|Peter Hamilton|Chaim Herzog|Adolf Hitler|Abbe Kanter|George Kistiakowski|Hal Lindsey|Sun Myung Moon|Desmond Morris|Timothy Nicely|Robert Nisbet|William Paddock|Aurelio Peccei|George Rathgens|Prem Rawat|Judith Roberts|Del Russel|Joseph Waggoner Jr.|George Wald|Howard Whalen|Maharishi Mahesh Yogi|Elmo Zumwalt
title: The Late Great Planet Earth
